amendment.description: Amendment adds language which opposes the creation of any international or global tax by the UN or its affiliated agencies.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 15 printed in Part B of House Report 109-175 to declare that it is U.S. policy to use the voice, vote, and influence of the U.S. to oppose the creation of any internationalor global taxation by the UN or its affiliated agencie s. Declares that no U.S. person shall be subject to an international tax if it is levied.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blunt amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
